Terms and Disclaimer

The following terms and conditions govern all use of the Miniwebtool.com website and all online tools, calculators, converters and other content available at or through the website. Please read this Agreement carefully before accessing or using the Website. By accessing or using any part of the web site, you agree to become bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the Website or use any services.

General Terms

Miniwebtool.com makes no claims as to the accuracy, completeness, timeliness or fitness for any particular purpose any results produced by any of our calculators, converters and other online tools. If you use the results for any purpose the responsibility of that use is entirely with you the user.

Miniwebtool.com reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace any part of this Agreement. It is your responsibility to check this Agreement periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the Website following the posting of any changes to this Agreement constitutes acceptance of those changes.

Miniwebtool.com may terminate your access to all or any part of the Website at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice, effective immediately.

Embed Widgets

Use of Widgets. By embedding a miniwebtool Widget, you agree that miniwebtool can use information collected through the miniwebtool Widget (including information collected through Google Analytics) in accordance with our Privacy Policy. You acknowledge that in order for the miniwebtool Widgets to function properly and to enhance user experience, miniwebtool places cookies and similar technologies (collectively, “Cookies”), and causes third party Cookies to be placed, on the browsers of users that visit websites that embed miniwebtool Widgets.

License Grant. Miniwebtool grants you a personal, non-transferable, non-assignable, non-sublicensable, non-exclusive, revocable and limited license to display miniwebtool Brand widgets.

Restrictions. All use of the miniwebtool Brand Features (including any associated goodwill) will inure to miniwebtool’s benefit. You will not, at any time, challenge or assist others to challenge the validity of the miniwebtool Brand Features and you will not attempt to register any trade names, trademarks, service marks, logos or domain names confusingly similar to the miniwebtool Brand Features.

Link and copyright notice. Widgets use is granted only if all links to miniwebtool.com and ©miniwebtool.com copyright notice are maintained.

Premium Services

Our basic Services are free, but we provide Premium services to all users who are members of our Campaign on Patreon or subscribe through Paypal.

You may purchase Premium Services, which include a removal of all the ads in all of your related online platforms, including from our Site and our applications, which are available for use in various app stores (e.g. Google Play, App Store). These Premium Services will be available to You only when You log in to our Services.

Payment: To purchase the Premium Services, you will be required to pay an annual or monthly payment using a payment method. For You to make such a purchase, we may direct you to our trusted payment service providers' websites. We may change the rates of the Premium Services from time to time and in our sole discretion.

Renewals: Your subscription will automatically renew each month or year 24-hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged automatically through the payment service provider you have used initially to purchase the Premium Services， unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

Cancellations: You may cancel the Premium Services at any time. You will instantly lose the Premium services after you cancel your subscription and will not receive a refund or credit for any remaining days in your current billing period. Subscription fees paid are final and non-refundable unless otherwise determined by Miniwebtool.com. If Miniwebtool.com reasonably determines that a user has violated these Terms of Services, Miniwebtool.com may immediately terminate the subscription and access to the Premium Services without notice and refund.

Refunds: If you believe that you have been charged in error, you should contact us within 60 days of such charge. No refunds will be given for any charges more than 60 days old. We reserve the right to refuse a refund request.

No Delay, Uptime and Availability: "No Delay" means that Premium members' requests do not be added to the waiting list among a large number of requests. However, the service does not provide any guarantee of the availability, response time, uptime, throughput or any other kind of connectivity to the Service.

My Toolbox: "My Toolbox" service will be available to You only when You have cookie and localstorage enabled on your browser.

Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability

The Website is provided "as is". Miniwebtool.com and its suppliers and licensors hereby disclaim all warranties of any kind, express or implied, including, without limitation, the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. Neither Miniwebtool.com nor its suppliers and licensors, makes any warranty that the Website will be error free or that access thereto will be continuous or uninterrupted. You understand that you download from, or otherwise obtain content or services through, the Website at your own discretion and risk.

Whilst every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of all our calculators, converters and other online tools, the results should be used as indication only. All calculations must be checked for accuracy and confirmed before use. Miniwebtool.com will not be held responsible for any loss, damage or inconvenience caused as a result of any inaccuracy or error within the website.

Trademark Disclaimer

All product and company names are trademarks™ or registered® trademarks of their respective holders. Use of them does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by them.

Copyright © Miniwebtool.com | Terms and Disclaimer | Privacy Policy | Contact Us

Privacy Policy

At Miniwebtool.com, we recognize that privacy of your personal information is important. Here is information on what types of personal information we receive and collect when you use visit Miniwebtool.com, and how we safeguard your information. We never sell your personal information to third parties.

Log Files

As with most other websites, we collect and use the data contained in log files. The information in the log files include your IP(internet protocol) address, your ISP (internet service provider, such as AOL or Shaw Cable), the browser you used to visit our site(such as Internet Explorer or Firefox), the time you visited our site and which pages you visited throughout our site.

Cookies and Web Beacons

We do use cookies to store information, such as your personal preferences when you visit our site. This could include only showing you a popup once in your visit, or the ability to login to some of our features, such as forums.

We also use third party advertisements to support our site. Some of these advertisers may use technology such as cookies and web beacons when they advertise on our site, which will also send these advertisers information including your IP address, your ISP, the browser you used to visit our site, and in some cases, whether you have Flash installed. This is generally used for geotargeting purposes or showing certain ads based on specific sites visited.

Third party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on a user's prior visits to our website. In particular, Google uses the DoubleClick DART cookie to enable it and its partners to serve ads to our users based on their visit to our sites and/or other sites on the Internet. Users may opt out of the use of the DART cookie by visiting the Google advertising opt-out page.

Analytics

This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. (“Google”). Google Analytics uses “cookies”, which are text files placed on your computer, to help the website analyze how users use the site. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website (including your IP address) will be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States. Google will use this information for the purpose of evaluating your use of the website, compiling reports on website activity for website operators and providing other services relating to website activity and internet usage. Google may also transfer this information to third parties where required to do so by law, or where such third parties process the information on Google’s behalf. Google will not associate your IP address with any other data held by Google. You may refuse the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings on your browser, however please note that if you do this you may not be able to use the full functionality of this website. By using this website, you consent to the processing of data about you by Google in the manner and for the purposes set out above.

No spam, spyware or spoofing

Miniwebtool.com never sends email SPAM to your inbox and never installs spyware on your personal computer. We share your concern about these practices and believes firmly in a consumer's rights and privacy.

External Links

If any part of this website links you to other sites, those sites do not operate under this Privacy Policy. We recommend you examine the privacy statements posted on those other websites to understand their procedures for collecting, using, and disclosing personal information.

How you can contact us

If you have any questions about this privacy statement, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this site, you can contact us via our Contact Us page.

Copyright © Miniwebtool.com | Terms and Disclaimer | Privacy Policy | Contact Us
